default_rules.title: Content:
default_rules.text:
- Here you can publish all types of content, create original or publish links to other sources;
- Content must be relevant to the thematic of the community;

default_rules.title: PROHIBITED:
Rules violation:
default_rules.text: In case of violation of the rules, comments and posts with violations will be deprived of payments and excluded from displaying in community and general feed. Also, leaders have the right to limit your access to the community

sign_up.title: Sign up
sign_up.can_close: You should complete registration, data can be missed otherwise.

attentionAfter.title: Attention
attentionAfter.description: We do not keep master passwords and have no opportunity to restore them.
attentionAfter.text:
Unfortunately, blockchain doesn’t allow us to restore passwords. It means that it is a user’s responsibility to keep the password in a safe place to be able to access it anytime.

We strongly recommend you to save your password and make its copy.

attentionBefore.title: Attention
attentionBefore.description: You want to select the advanced mode and continue with the Master Password
attentionBefore.text:
After confirmation, we'll generate for you a 52-character crypto password.
We suggest you copy this password or download a PDF file with it.
We do not keep Master Passwords and have no opportunity to restore them.

We strongly recommend you to save your password and make its copy.

confirmation_code_email.title: An email has been sent with the verification code. Please enter the code here

create_password.title: Create password
create_password.description:
We do not keep passwords and have no opportunity to restore them.
Please save your password.
create_password.use_password: I want to use Master Password

hints: The number of characters must not exceed 32
Uppercase letters in the username are not allowed

The user name may contain a "dot" character
The presence of two "dot" characters in a row is not valid

vote.title: Rewards for likes

reward_for_post.title: How do I get rewards for my posts?
reward_for_post.desc: After you publish the post, community members will have {{hours}} hours to like or dislike it. If your post reaches the Top 10 posts of the day, you will be rewarded.

username.invalid_symbols: Username may contain only lower case letters, digits, dots or dashes
username.start_with: Username should start with a letter
username.too_short: Username should contain at least 3 symbols
username.too_long: Username is too long. 32 symbols are maximum
username.several_dots: Username may contain only one dot in a row
username.several_dashes: Username may contain only one dash in a row
username.invalid_sequences: Username may contain only one dot or one dash in a row
username.ends_with: Username should end with a letter or a digit
